law.catch_line: Administrative regulations to license research on industrial hemp and hemp products and establish testing criteria and protocols.
law.text: The commission shall promulgate administrative regulations, in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A, as necessary to administer the industrial hemp research program, and to license persons to grow industrial hemp, pursuant to KRS 260.850 to 260.869. The commission shall include as part of its administrative regulations, at a minimum, the establishment of industrial hemp testing criteria and protocols.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 2, effective June 21, 2001.
